opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of February, 2016, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Alfonso Percy Pew, Camp Hill, pro se.

Theron Richard Perez, Jeffrey M. Paladina, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Mechanicsburg, for Co. Wetzel.
